snippet: Another victory for the Knicks, this time against Phoenix, was memorable because they moved to 7-0 at the Garden, but mostly because Rasheed Wallace was ejected after playing only 1 minute 25 seconds.
abstract: New York Knicks defeat Phoenix Suns, 106-99; Knicks forward Rasheed Wallace plays for 1 minute 25 seconds before getting ejected from game with two technical fouls.
lead_paragraph: Another victory for the Knicks, this time against Phoenix, was memorable because they moved to 7-0 at the Garden, but mostly because Rasheed Wallace was ejected after playing only 1 minute 25 seconds.

headline.seo: Routine Win for Knicks, Except for Ejection of Rasheed Wallace
headline.main: Knicks Stay Perfect at Home as Wallace Steals Show
headline.print_headline: Victory for Knicks, but Also an Ejection and an Apology
